jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Report to Head of Regional Corporate Affairs for East Indonesia and coordinate daily with the applicable Regional Head.
  • Give initiative, design, execute, and monitor GO-JEK's corporate affairs program, including social media and event management.
  • Maintains and nurtures the relationships with multi stakeholders, media, communities, NGO, especially in the respective region.
  • Responsible to increase GO-JEK Positive Share of Voice, and the internal and external understanding and awareness of the organization's objectives and achievements.
  • Develop GO-JEK internal and external communication branding and communication programs.
  • Crisis manager for the applicable region in Indonesia.
  • Work together with Operations, Public Policy & Government Relation, Marketing, and other related divisions within GO-JEK.

• Degree qualified in marketing communications, Journalism, PR or a related discipline
  • Minimum has 8 years of experience in corporate communications, corporate affairs, or public affairs
  • Solid understanding of the media landscape in Indonesia and established strong relationships with key journalists/editors
  • Proven track record in managing communications strategies in large multi-national organization
  • Demonstrated exposure on handling multi stakeholders both in regional and nation-wide
  • Strategic and structured thought process and good communications & interpersonal skills
  • Good writing skill and excellent written and spoken English and Indonesia
  • Experienced in handling crisis and has sensitivity for issues
  • Ability to work in a fast-paced corporate environment (flexibility and adaptability is a key)
  • Willing to work in/relocate to respective region or provincial city across Indonesia
